title: Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 50 (Gambling)
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 50 (Gambling):

We have 35 titles here:

-  Barnes - The Real Cost of Casinos; a Health Equity Impact Assessment (2013)

-  Coryn - Economic Aspects of Gambling Regulation-EU and US Perspectives (2008)

-  Derevensky & Gupta (Eds.) - Gambling Problems in Youth; Theoretical and Applied Perspectives (2004)

-  Dickerson & O'Conner - Gambling as an Addictive Behaviour; Impaired Control, Harm Minimisation, Treatment and Prevention (2005)

-  Ferentzy & Turner - The History of Problem Gambling; Temperance, Substance Abuse, Medicine, and Metaphors (2013)

-  Gambling Problems in First Nations and Inuit Communities of Quebec; a Brief Status Report (2010)

-  Gambling Review Report, Dept. for Culture, Media and Sport, UK (2001)

-  Gambling; Productivity Commission Inquiry Report, Vol. 1, Australia (Feb. 2010)

-  Gambling; Productivity Commission Inquiry Report, Vol. 2, Australia (Feb. 2010)

-  George & Gowden-Jones - Gambling; the Hidden Addiction, Royal College of Psychiatrists (2014)

-  Goldman - Great Gambling Scams; True Stories of the World's Most Amazing Hustlers (2007)

-  Grinols - The Hidden Social Costs of Gambling (2011)

-  Hoffer - Jackpot Nation; Rambling and Gambling Across Our Landscape of Luck (2007)

-  Kingma - Global Gambling; Cultural Perspectives on Gambling Organizations (2010)

-  Kling - The Rise of the Biggest Little City; an Encyclopedic History of Reno Gaming, 1931-1981 (2000)

-  Littler & Fignaut (Eds.) - The Regulation of Gambling; European and National Perspectives (2007)

-  McFarland et al - Jackpot! Money Laundering Through Online Gambling (McAfee Labs, 2014)

-  McGowan - The Gambling Debate (2008)

-  Meyer et al (Eds.) - Problem Gambling in Europe; Challenges, Prevention, and Interventions (2009)

-  Morse & Goss - Governing Future; Casino Gambling in America (2007)

-  Nelson & Mason - How the South Joined the Gambling Nation; the Politics of State Policy Innovation (2007)

-  Newman - Gambling; Hazard and Reward (1972)

-  Orford - An Unsafe Bet; the Dangerous Rise of Gambling and the Debate We Should Be Having (2011)

-  Parmalee - Legalized Gambling (2011)

-  Pathological Gambling; a Critical Review (NAS, 2003)

-  Problem Gamblers and Their Finances; a Guide for Treatment Professionals (2000)

-  Problem Gambling; the Issues, the Options, Center for Addiction and Mental Health, Canada (2012)

-  Reith - Research on the Social Impacts of Gambling, Scottish Executive Social Research (2006)

-  Schull - Addiction by Design; Machine Gambling in Las Vegas (2012)

-  Simich & Wright (Eds.) - The Peoples of Las Vegas; One City, Many Faces (2005)

-  The Impact of Gambling, Select Committee on Gambling, New South Wales (2014)

-  Thompson - Gambling in America; an Encyclopedia of History, Issues, and Society (2001)

-  Toronto Public Health - The Health Impacts of Gambling Expansion in Toronto, Technical Report (Nov. 2012)

-  Wardle et al - British Gambling Prevalence Survey, 2010 (2011)

-  Ziettlow - Seniors in Casino Land; Tough Luck for Older Americans (IAV, 2014)
